column3: You wish to have words? ...Very well, what would you know?
What is it that you do exactly?
Is your memory as fleeting as your lifespan, child? As I told you before, this is my home. You are welcome to come and go as you please.
You need ask? My head is not merely for show: I am the archfiend feared and revered since time immemorial. The Great Gourd, who once led legions of darkness...
...Is, in fact, merely a title held by those in my coven. Each generation, the knowledge to control denizens of the void is passed down alongside the appellation.
I watch. My ancestors once bound the voidsent to their will as a means to wage war, and caused irreparable harm to the world in so doing.

Remorseful for their actions, they swore to never be complicit in such a tragedy again. We have watched ever since. Our goal is not to harm the minions of Darkness, but to educate them. Show them that peace is an option.
But I have spoken enough. I had not realized entertaining a guest could be quite so thrilling...heh heh heh.
...I sense you too have formed a pact with a creature of the void. Be very careful, child. Let your guard down for a single moment, and the servant shall become the master.
